feed.title: Minimal signing flow changes for TRUC channels

entry.title: Minimal signing flow changes for TRUC channels
entry.summary: The discussion revolves around the potential applicability of a concept known as "fast forward" for Point Time-Locked Contracts (PTLCs) in a specific context. The acknowledgment for the effort in retrieving relevant citations indicates that there's an exploration or research component involved, suggesting that the information or insights being discussed are part of a broader investigative or analytical effort within the realm of PTLCs or related technologies. This exploration could be aimed at enhancing or understanding mechanisms that could benefit from the fast forward concept, specifically in how it might be applied to improve or innovate within the existing frameworks of PTLCs.
